‚ÄúWealth is freedom‚Äù

Freedom to create.

Freedom to sleep in, or hustle, or do whatever your spirit is moving you in the moment.

Wealth is freedom from worry of the things you have control over

It‚Äôs choosing love over hate,

Wealth is having enough money to not worry,
but not too much where it makes you worry.
It‚Äôs the stuff that brings you joy,
but also the stuff that challenges you and makes you stronger.

Wealth is the ability to believe in yourself and know that you are ‚Äúenough‚Äù,

Wealth is peace.

Wealth is contentment.

Wealth is about being good stewards of our money, yes, but it‚Äôs also so much more than that. It‚Äôs how we live and think and shape our lives no matter what‚Äôs going on in our worlds.
